content:
Dear @RalfJ and @oli

It would appear that the Miri cron job build failed. Would you mind investigating this issue?

Thanks in advance!
Sincerely,
The Miri Cronjobs Bot
Revert happening in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/91088, MIR semantics discussion in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/91095.
